chartbeat.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

content.description: Real-time NCAAM College Basketball scores on ESPN
content.keywords: NCAAM Scores, NCAAM scoreboard, College Basketball Scores, College Basketball scoreboard

headlines.description: Trey Phills scored a career-high 23 points and Miye Oni added 17 points and made two steals in the final seconds as Yale held off Brown 78-72 in an Ivy League opener on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Phills, Oni lead Yale to 78-72 win in Ivy League opener

video.headline: Yale Outlasts Brown, 78-72, In Ivy League Opener  - Via Ivy League

headlines.description: Kelan Martin scored a career-high 37 points and Butler snapped a three-game losing streak by beating Marquette 94-83 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Martin scores career-high 37, Butler beats Marquette 94-83

headlines.description: Tony Carr scored nine of his 17 points, including a game-winning long jumper with three seconds left in overtime, and Penn State beat Nebraska 76-74 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Carr's jumper lifts Penn State over Nebraska 76-74 in OT

headlines.description: Darrell Davis had 28 points and nine assists on Friday night and Dayton set a program record with 17 made 3-pointers in a 106-79 win over VCU.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dayton makes 17 3s, beats VCU 106-79

headlines.description: Kevin Zabo scored 24 points and Adonis De La Rosa scored on a jump hook with 21 seconds remaining to lead Kent State past Ohio 70-69 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zabo, De La Rosa spark Kent State to 70-69 victory

headlines.description: James Towns hit an open 3-pointer from the top of the circle and then added two free throws for an 11-point lead with 2:45 left and Niagara held on through a white-knuckle finish to edge Monmouth 78-77 Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Niagara holds off Monmouth's hot finish, 78-77

headlines.description: Takal Molson tossed in 23 points on 9-of-12 shooting, including 4 of 6 from 3-point range, to guide Canisius to a 70-58 victory over Saint Peter's on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Molson scores 23, leads Canisius past Saint Peter's 70-58

headlines.description: Frederick Scott got 12 of his 15 points in the first half and Rider cruised to its fourth straight victory with a 78-60 win over Quinnipiac on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rider coasts to 78-60 win over Quinnipiac

headlines.description: Jalen Hayes scored 30 points and grabbed 11 rebounds, Kendrick Nunn added 20 points with five 3-pointers, and Oakland rallied to beat Cleveland State 81-68 on Thursday night to win five of its last six.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hayes scores 30, Oakland rallies to beat Cleveland St 81-68

headlines.description: Corey Allen had 34 points, Jermaine Jackson Jr. added a career-high 32 and Detroit Mercy rallied to beat Youngstown State 93-91 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Detroit Mercy rallies to beat Youngstown State 93-91

headlines.description: Ron Patterson scored 16 points with three steals and Aaron Brennan added 15 points with 11 rebounds as IUPUI defeated Green Bay 67-61 on Friday night, sweeping the Phoenix in Horizon League play and winning two in a row for the first time this season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Patterson, Brennan help IUPUI sweep Green Bay 67-61

headlines.description: Chris Clemons scored 25 and buried a 3-pointer at the buzzer to lift Campbell to a 65-64 victory over High Point on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Clemons' 3 at buzzer sends Campbell past High Point 65-64

headlines.description: Liam O'Reilly scored 17 points, David Efianayi added 12 more and Gardner-Webb hung on Friday night for a 59-54 win over Radford to move into a tie for first place in the Big South Conference.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gardner-Webb holds off Radford for 59-54 win

headlines.description: Isaiah Walton had 22 points and Longwood scored the game's final 14 points to overtake Liberty 58-51 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Longwood scores final 14 points to beat Liberty 58-51

headlines.description: Ahmad Thomas scored 21 points, Macio Teaque added 16, and UNC Asheville used a hot first half to beat Presbyterian 76-56 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: UNC Asheville tops Presbyterian 76-56 behind Thomas

headlines.description: Malique Trent-Street had 17 points, five rebounds, five assists and six steals and Hampton beat Delaware State 78-56 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hampton beats Delaware State 78-56

headlines.description: Xavier Cooks and Bjorn Broman scored the final four points at the free-throw line, Cooks finishing with 15 points and Broman 12 as Winthrop defeated Charleston Southern 64-53 Friday night, ending a three-game slide.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cooks, Broman help Winthrop defeat Charleston Southern 64-53

headlines.description: Devin Cannady scored 17 points with 6-of-12 shooting to lead Princeton past Columbia for a 72-56 win Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Princeton sinks 15 from long range to beat Columbia 72-56

video.headline: Princeton defeats Columbia, 72-56  - Via Ivy League

headlines.description: AJ Brodeur scored 18 points with nine rebounds and six assists and Penn defeated Cornell 69-61 on Friday night, beating the Big Red for the 10th consecutive time.
headlines.shortLinkText: Penn defeats Cornell for 10th straight time, 69-61

video.headline: Penn holds off Cornell 69-61 in Ivy League play  - Via Ivy League

headlines.description: Dikembe Dixson scored 22 points, Marcus Ottey added 20, and UIC never trailed in beating Milwaukee 88-73 on Friday night to win its third straight.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dixson, Ottey combine for 42, UIC beats Milwaukee 88-73

headlines.description: Jalen Lindsey had 18 points, including 4 of 8 from 3-point range, Alpha Diallo had 14 of his 16 points in the second half, and Providence beat DePaul 71-64 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Providence heats up in 2nd half, beats DePaul 71-64

headlines.description: Victor Sanders scored 18 points and Brayon Blake added 11, including a key 3-pointer late, as Idaho pulled away in the last 13 minutes to defeat Eastern Washington 58-51 Friday night, capping a comeback from 14 points down and snapping a 12-game home...
headlines.shortLinkText: Sanders, Blake help Idaho defeat Eastern Washington 58-51

nowFeed.headline: USC junior forward Bennie Boatwright will miss the rest of the season after suffering a left patella injury during Thursday's win, per the school. Was averaging 13.6 points and 6.4 rebounds.
nowFeed.story: USC junior forward Bennie Boatwright will miss the rest of the season after suffering a left patella injury during Thursday's win, per the school. Was averaging 13.6 points and 6.4 rebounds.

nowFeed.headline: Back at @KUHoops Brings back a great memory thanks to a great group of players. @LBSUhoops https://t.co/aMhklA2Vbl
nowFeed.story: Back at @KUHoops Brings back a great memory thanks to a great group of players. @LBSUhoops vimeo.com/256137612

nowFeed.headline: Under Sean Miller Deandre Ayton is maximizing his enormous potential. Ayton has always possessed the physical tools and a solid basketball IQ. He has worked hard at Zona along with making the adjustments to college basketball. For a freshman big man it's really hard to dominate right away. Since he arrived in the states he was a top ranked player in his class. Would have been top 5 in last years NBA draft. Now he will be a top 3 pick and will be much more prepared.
nowFeed.story: Under Sean Miller Deandre Ayton is maximizing his enormous potential. Ayton has always possessed the physical tools and a solid basketball IQ. He has worked hard at Zona along with making the adjustments to college basketball. For a freshman big man it's really hard to dominate right away. Since he arrived in the states he was a top ranked player in his class. Would have been top 5 in last years NBA draft. Now he will be a top 3 pick and will be much more prepared.

nowFeed.headline:
The race for the No. 1 seeds is more wide open now after a few recent upsets. Per BPI, here's where we stand:

Virginia 99%
Villanova 98%
Purdue 71%
Michigan State 52%
Xavier 32%
Duke 29%
North Carolina 9%
Tennessee 4%
Auburn 3%
Kansas 2%

nowFeed.headline: Houston coach Kelvin Sampson said "good teams should win at home," including his Cougars, who are 13-0 this season at home, including Thursday's 67-62 upset of No. 5 Cincinnati.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati shot just 6-for-19 (31.6%) in the second half vs. Houston, including a FG drought of nearly 12 minutes down the stretch. The Bearcats got out rebounded 36-27. Both of those bit them tonight.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati shot just 6-for-19 (31.6%) in the second half vs. Houston, including a FG drought of nearly 12 minutes down the stretch. The Bearcats got out rebounded 36-27. Both of those bit them tonight.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati's loss at Houston will likely drop them from the No. 2-seed line in Joe Lunardi's Bracketology, with Texas Tech likely being the beneficiary to move up. The Cougars, who were a 10-seed coming into the night, scored another big resume win after picking one up over Wichita State in January.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati's loss at Houston will likely drop them from the No. 2-seed line in Joe Lunardi's Bracketology, with Texas Tech likely being the beneficiary to move up. The Cougars, who were a 10-seed coming into the night, scored another big resume win after picking one up over Wichita State in January.

nowFeed.headline: Houston upsets No. 5 Cincinnati 67-62, ending the Bearcats nation-leading 16-game winning streak. It's the first time the Cougars have beaten two top-10 opponents in a season since 1984.
nowFeed.story: Houston upsets No. 5 Cincinnati 67-62, ending the Bearcats nation-leading 16-game winning streak. It's the first time the Cougars have beaten two top-10 opponents in a season since 1984.

nowFeed.headline: Ironically, Cincinnati's loss to Houston also finally gives Cincinnati its first win over a likely NCAA Tournament team.
nowFeed.story: Ironically, Cincinnati's loss to Houston also finally gives Cincinnati its first win over a likely NCAA Tournament team.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati getting it done at the foul line tonight, hitting 17-of-21 free throw attempts. The Bearcats are hanging on to a 50-49 lead over Houston with 4:10 left.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati getting it done at the foul line tonight, hitting 17-of-21 free throw attempts. The Bearcats are hanging on to a 50-49 lead over Houston with 4:10 left.
